Author: isthised
Text: It’s been around three weeks but tbh my first week and a half were in IOP and I was still restricting pretty bad. I’m juuust starting to see small signs of improvement now in PHP but still not enough to keep them from sending me to Res. They haven’t been flexible with meals at the IOP/PHP levels when I’ve asked if we could reduce lunch and dinner even if it means adding a snack, but maybe Res will be more understanding.

Author: libismanaged
Text: Tbh, this has been my biggest problem. And believe it or not... they know what they’re talking about. I went 2.5weeks of feeling awful after even a single meal, but now I can do at least 75% of my meal plan comfortably. It’s a process that I did NOT believe in, but slowly began to trust.
